comments.body: You are naming this as SyncOrAsync but on type side you are doing intersection instead of union..

If I replace ``SyncLimiter & AsyncLimiter`` by ``SyncLimiter | AsyncLimiter``, then the test which is based on the Readme of the package does not pass.

Should I rename it to SyncAndAsyncListener? I used "or" because it can be used as sync or async function.

To the background: When the in-memory-storage is used, then the returned function can be used with and without callback (asynchronous or synchronous).
